markup.big_centered_page_number¶

abjad.tools.markup.big_centered_page_number(text=None)¶

New in version 1.1.1.

Return Abjad centered page number Markup.

abjad> t = markup.centered_page_number( )
abjad> print t.format
\markup { 
   \fill-line {
   \bold \fontsize #3
   \on-the-fly #print-page-number-check-first
   \fromproperty #'page:page-number-string } }

listtools.zip_nontruncating

Next topic

mathtools.binary_string
